page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE AT HOME
page.content: I wake up about 6.00 _ 6.30 every morning. I go into the Bathroom then back to bed, to read my books. I get up about 9.30 on holidays or weekends. I get washed then dressed. I usually wear trousers. I have my breakfast which is toast and cereal. After my breakfast I either read or watch television. When I am by myself I have lunch about 1.00 and cook myself poached egg or spaghetti rings on toast. My hobbies are collecting stamps and rubbers. On Thursdays I go to Horse Rangers by Hampton Court. We have two cats which are Blue Point (Siamese),three goldfish, eight bantams of which five are hens.
